name: Dodgeball X
description:
Welcome to gym class aboard Space Station X. Today's sport is dodgeball. Since there's no gravity in space, the ball continues to move much longer than it would on Earth. Things can get out of control very quickly! Defeat the other team to win!

Controls:

Move - W, A, S, D

Throw Ball - J, Left Mouse Button

Slow Time - K, Right Mouse Button

Pause Game - P, Esc

Assets:

Explosion Particle system:

 Based on "Unreal Engine 4 Particle Systems Tutorial" by Tommy Tran - https://www.raywenderlich.com/270-unreal-engine-4-particle-systems-tutorial

Character:

"Shannon" character and animations taken from Mixamo - https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Sounds:

Menu Click:

"Click 1" by vladsgames - https://freesound.org/people/vladsgames/sounds/467487/

Game Over:

"Laser Classic Shot 4" by bubaproducer - https://freesound.org/people/bubaproducer/sounds/151011/

Throw:

"Retro_Laser_Shot_02" by MATRIXXX_ - https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/414886/

Enemy Hit:

"Retro_Hit" by MATRIXXX_ - https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/523769/

Made with Unreal Engine 4
